alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 5:10AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Estill, Jackson and Rockcastle Counties through 600 AM EST... At 508 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a group of strong thunderstorms near Indian Lakes Park, or 11 miles west of Mount Vernon, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorms will be near... Maretburg and Spiro around 515 AM EST. Mount Vernon, Conway, Roundstone, Hiatt, Lake Linville, Renfro Valley and Muellersville around 520 AM EST. Boone, Disputanta, Snider, Bummer, Wildie, Hummel, Orlando, Dudley Station and Flat Rock around 525 AM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Morrill, Threelinks, Goochland, Johnetta, Loam, Cooksburg, Kerby Knob, Sandgap, Clover Bottom, Shirley, Hisel, Collingsworth, Eglon, Hurley, McKee, Brazil, Alcorn, Foxtown, Blanton Flats, Waneta, Locust Branch, Jinks, Macedonia, Wind Cave, Lakes, Drip Rock, Alumbaugh, Wagersville, Turkey Foot, New Zion, Station Camp, Leighton, Shade, Texola and Pryse. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 AM EST for south central and southeastern Kentucky.
